data.name: Two Worlds II - Echoes of the Dark Past 2 Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Enjoy Antaloor apart from visuals: with the Two Worlds II: Echoes of the Dark Past 2 Soundtrack! Over 40 minutes epic, atmospherically toned music will be a feast for your ears.

PLAYLIST


  • 01. Echoes of the Dark Past 2 - Main Theme -- [03:29]
  • 02. Signes in the Sand -- [03:34]
  • 03. Beyond Quest -- [03:17]
  • 04. Shield Gods -- [02:16]
  • 05. As long as we stand -- [02:38]
  • 06. Drums of Darkness -- [03:31]
  • 07. Vox Ambis -- [03:39]
  • 08. Through the Ghosts -- [03:02]
  • 09. Dungeons - Part I -- [03:01]
  • 10. Dungeons - Part II -- [03:17]
  • 11. Dungeons - Part III -- [02:08]
  • 12. Dungeons - Part IV -- [02:09]
  • 13. Evil within Village -- [02:08]
  • 14. Into the Catacombs -- [01:11]
  • 15. Knight of the desert - Part I -- [01:11]
  • 16. Knight of the desert - Part II -- [01:07]
  • 17. Knight of the desert - Part III -- [01:08]

2018 - Soundtrack composed by Goran Bastinac. Published by TopWare Interactive.

data.short_description: Enjoy Antaloor apart from visuals: with the Two Worlds II: Echoes of the Dark Past 2 Soundtrack! Over 40 minutes epic, atmospherically toned music will be a feast for your ears.

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual-Core Prozessor (2,0 GHz) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB or more
  • Graphics: Radeon HD, Geforce (Shader 3.0 and 512 MB RAM)
  • DirectX®: DirectX 10
  • Hard Drive: 12 GB
  • Sound: DirectX comp. Stereo Sound Card
  • Other: Internet connection with 16 KBPS or more for Multiplayer recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
• OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Quad-Core Prozessor (2,4 GHz) or better
  • Memory: 8 GB or more
  • Graphics: Radeon HD, Geforce (Shader 4.0 and 2 GB RAM)
  • DirectX®: DirectX 10
  • Hard Drive: 20 GB
  • Sound: DirectX comp. 5.1 Sound Card
  • Other: Broadband Internet connection for Multiplayer recommended
